mapper.select: select `timeline_no`, `COLUMN_NAME`, `COLUMN_NO`, `old_history`, `history`, `DML_KIND`, `history_time`, `team_no`, t.`id`, `nickname`, `image`, `table_name`, `all_board_no` from `timeline` t join `user` u on t.id = u.id where `team_no` = #{teamNo} order by `timeline_no` desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `TODO_CONTENT` AS TC JOIN `TODO_LIST` AS TL ON TC.NO = TL.NO WHERE `TEAM_NO` = #{teamNo};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `BOARD_FILE` AS BF JOIN `ALL_BOARD_LIST` AS AL ON BF.`ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO` = AL.`ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO` WHERE AL.`TEAM_NO` = #{teamNo}

select 'Kanban Cards' AS `LABEL`, count(*) AS `VALUE` from kanban_card as kc join kanban_list as kl on kc.KANBAN_LIST_NO = kl.KANBAN_LIST_NO join all_board_list as al on kl.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO = al.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO where write_date >= curdate() and team_no = #{teamNo} UNION select 'Boards' AS `LABEL`, count(*) AS `VALUE` from BOARD_LIST AS BL JOIN ALL_BOARD_LIST AS AL ON BL.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO = AL.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO WHERE WRITE_DATE >= CURDATE() AND TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}

select count(*) from kanban_card as kc join kanban_list as kl on kc.KANBAN_LIST_NO = kl.KANBAN_LIST_NO join all_board_list as al on kl.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO = al.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO where write_date >= curdate() and team_no = #{teamNo};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIST AS BL JOIN ALL_BOARD_LIST AS AL ON BL.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO = AL.ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO WHERE WRITE_DATE >= CURDATE() AND TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
SELECT `NICKNAME` AS `LABEL`, COUNT(*) AS `VALUE` FROM `TOTAL_POSTS_SUMMARY` where team_no = #{teamNo} group by `ID`

select 'All Todo' AS `LABEL`, count(*) AS `VALUE` FROM `TODO_CONTENT` AS TC JOIN `TODO_LIST` AS TL ON TC.NO = TL.NO WHERE `TEAM_NO` = #{teamNo} UNION select 'Done Todo' AS `LABEL`, count(*) AS `VALUE` FROM `TODO_CONTENT` AS TC JOIN `TODO_LIST` AS TL ON TC.NO = TL.NO WHERE `STATE` = 'done' AND `TEAM_NO` = #{teamNo}
